query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS agent_weight_history (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  snapshot_timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  market_regime VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  technical_weight DECIMAL(5,4) NOT NULL,
  fundamental_weight DECIMAL(5,4) NOT NULL,
  sentiment_weight DECIMAL(5,4) NOT NULL,
  risk_weight DECIMAL(5,4) NOT NULL,
  regime_weight DECIMAL(5,4) NOT NULL,
  execution_weight DECIMAL(5,4) NOT NULL,
  coordinator_weight DECIMAL(5,4) NOT NULL,
  trigger_reason VARCHAR(255),
  performance_metrics JSON,
  created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX idx_user_timestamp (user_id, snapshot_timestamp),
  INDEX idx_market_regime (market_regime)
);

  user_id VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,

  technical_weight DECIMAL(5,4) NOT NULL,

  sentiment_weight DECIMAL(5,4) NOT NULL,
  risk_weight DECIMAL(5,4) NOT NULL,
  regime_weight DECIMAL(5,4) NOT NULL,
  execution_weight DECIMAL(5,4) NOT NULL,
  coordinator_weight DECIMAL(5,4) NOT NULL,
  trigger_reason VARCHAR(255),
  performance_metrics JSON,
  created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX idx_user_timestamp (user_id, snapshot_timestamp),
  INDEX idx_market_regime (market_regime)
);
